# probounds.calculate_bounds_combined_by_feature { #probounds.probounds.calculate_bounds_combined_by_feature }

```python
probounds.calculate_bounds_combined_by_feature(
    df_observed,
    df_experimental,
    feature,
)
```

Compute combined bounds for each category of ``feature``.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name            | Type      | Description                                                      | Default    |
|-----------------|-----------|------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| df_observed     | FrameLike | Observational dataset containing the ``feature`` column.         | _required_ |
| df_experimental | FrameLike | Experimental dataset containing the ``feature`` column.          | _required_ |
| feature         | str       | Column on which to partition the data prior to computing bounds. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                 | Description                                                  |
|--------|--------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | dict\[Hashable, dict\[str, float\]\] | Mapping of feature value to the combined probability bounds. |
